Date formatting with presets and custom format support Set BLG_DATE_FORMAT to a preset name or custom Nim times format string.

Vars

dateFormat: string
Active format string, set by initDateFormat

Consts

DatePresets = (data: [(6983866627672512496, "eu-long", "d MMMM yyyy"),

Procs

proc formatTime(t: Time): string {....raises: [TimeFormatParseError], tags: [],
                                   forbids: [].}
Format Time using dateFormat, replacing 'ord' with ordinal suffix. 
proc initDateFormat() {....raises: [KeyError], tags: [ReadEnvEffect], forbids: [].}
Load BLG_DATE_FORMAT from env, default to "eu-long".
